TopicTitle: What part textures bug you the most? Complain about it! I can fix it.

Articles.Content:
> 
> Hello everyone. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Personally I've been pretty annoyed that the spaceplane pieces (and a number of other parts) don't all have matching colors or textures. They have a base white coat which is used for all splaceplane parts, but there are about five different shades that are used for wing trims. SO..... rather then complaining about it, I'm going to try and solve it.

If you know of any part textures (exempt from parts in GIF) that are in need or retexturing, complain here!

![Uyo7EYB.gif](http://i.imgur.com/Uyo7EYB.gif)

I will be releasing these edits in a mod. - more info on that later

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-01T22:47:33Z" title="05/01/2015 10:47  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 1, 2015</time> by Avera9eJoe**

Can you do the SLS (NASA) parts? It's always annoyed me how their stripes don't match up...

Thanks for doing this, by the way ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Can you do the SLS (NASA) parts? It's always annoyed me how their stripes don't match up...
> Thanks for doing this, by the way ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I fixed that already ^-^ look at them in the GIF ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> I fixed that already ^-^ look at them in the GIF ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

... and I'm stupid c: I was focusing too much on the airplane parts, heh.

Awesome anyways! I might download this when it comes out.
There is a part that someone scribbled Kurvy on.
